comments.content:
Well, it's a font... but I haven't been able to find it. The double-s ligature suggests more than an amateur design effort. I have searched MyFonts, Dafont and AbstractFonts. The only other likely source is Veer, which I will check next.

Any information about what this is from, and how old it is? If it's commercial, I suppose it could be a custom font design.

- Mike Yanega

No luck at Veer. Either their keywords are not helpful, or they just don't have it.

If you just need something similar it seemed that [Corradine Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419133946/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/corradine+fonts/fonts/?refby=bowfin) had a few with a similar 'untrained' script look. Especially Prissa, Rapidda, Helga and Corradine Handwriting.

- Mike Yanega
